sentences.en: Article 19 A budget consists of budgetary revenues and budgetary expenditures.
sentences.cn: 第十九条预算由预算收入和预算支出组成.

sentences.en: Budget closure: Lapsing of authority to incur approved Budgetary expenses.
sentences.cn: 预算关闭期: 指停止使用已批准的预算支出权力的限期.

sentences.en: Build centralized budgetary system, consolidate accounting management.
sentences.cn: 建立统一的预算体系, 统一会计管理.

sentences.en: Increasingly, analysis of a building's life - cycle is becoming part of budgetary considerations.
sentences.cn: 同时, 建筑的使用期分析已越来越成为预算考虑的因素之一.

sentences.en: Nevertheless , the soft budgetary binding power through banks would never last long.
sentences.cn: 除此之外, 透过银行的软预算权力不再持续.

sentences.en: Note: The subjects of fund budgetary expenditures are adjusted in 2007.
sentences.cn: 注: 2007年基金预算支出科目调整.

sentences.en: Review expenditures of requisitioning cost centers to insure conformance to budgetary limitations.
sentences.cn: 检查各成本中心的支出,保证其与预算的一致性.

sentences.en: The biggest potential pitfall may not be technical but budgetary.
sentences.cn: 最大的潜在陷阱可能不是技术问题,而是预算.

sentences.en: The budgetary and the negotiating cycles were simply out of phase.
sentences.cn: 预算的周期同谈判的周期简直不协调.

sentences.en: The budgetary method doesn't have the meaning of environmental science and ecology.
sentences.cn: 这一计算方法不具有环境学和生态学方面的意义.

sentences.en: The corner of any budgetary system is the sales or revenue forecast.
sentences.cn: 预算系统的窘境是对于销售和收益的预测.

sentences.en: The overall budgetary management is the core of the control and evaluation.
sentences.cn: 全面预算管理就是控制和评估的核心.

sentences.en: There are huge budgetary pressures on all governments in Europe to reduce their armed forces.
sentences.cn: 欧洲各国政府都面临着巨大的裁军预算压力。

sentences.en: This skew was even more extreme in the extra - budgetary funds.
sentences.cn: 预算外资助的这种倾斜甚至更极端.

sentences.en: This will calculate the percentage deviation from the budgetary figure.
sentences.cn: 这将计算出与预算偏差的百分比.

sentences.en: Total budgetary management is the important component of enterprise management.
sentences.cn: 全面预算管理是企业管理的重要组成部分.

trans.tran_en: relating to the way money is spent in a budget
